Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that President Duterte did not announce "no classes for all" until 2021. He actually stated that traditional in-class learning would be banned but alternative learning methods would be provided.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or official announcement from President Duterte stating that there will be "no classes for all" until 2021.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that President Duterte made the announcement of "no classes for all" until 2021 during his SONA, which is not true.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that President Duterte emphasized the implementation of online learning, modular learning, and TV- and radio-based broadcast as alternative methods of education during the COVID-19 pandemic.
